ygData.subject: Re: The Awakening
ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson kneels in silence in front of Optimus Prime, and hears a tiny voice.  He smiles. He knew who it was.  He offers a hand to Elita, as if to welcome her in

Tucson kneels in silence in front of Optimus Prime, and hears a tiny voice.=
  He smiles. He knew who it was.  He offers a hand to Elita, as if to welco=
me her in his arms.  

"Elita, it's all right, come here, join me.  I'm sur=
e your father won't mind you spending a little time with your Uncle."

As l=
arge as he was, there was still an air of extreme gentility in his body lan=
guage.  He had many things he wanted to share with her, one of them being O=
ptimus Prime's legacy.  

" You're looking at the most legendary Autobot le=
ader of all time.  This is Optimus Prime, created and restorred by Alpha Tr=
ion vorns ago. Before he became the great leader that he was, he went by th=
e name, of Orion Pax, a brave Autobot who didn't believe in giving up witho=
ut a fight.  One day, Orion Pax suffered greatly in battle, and was brought=
  to Alpha trion where he became Optimus Prime." 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogro=

d peace in an atmosphere full of tension? But most of all Optimus, our path=
s appear to be the same, our values, our courage, our strength and our fait=
h in those around us. Are our origins alike? If so, is there a direction I =
should be going toward? One that will help me to guide the Autobots and Max=
imals to finding the road toward peaceful existance? If anyone would know t=
hese answers, you would."
> >

a container, and gives it as an offering to Optimus Prime.

> =
The body and form of Optimus Prime remained absolutely still, there
> was n=
o discernable movement from him, no spark of energy, no sign of
> recogniti=
on of any type. It could be that the Matrix energy that had
> been animate =
before has been temporarily used up, or perhaps the
> situation now was not=
 sufficiently critical so as to call it into
> being. In either case Optimu=
s prime looked, for all intents and
> purposes, as dead as any robot can ap=
pear and still be awaiting a
> rebirth in another few million years.
